original_text: He said in a loud voice, ‘ Respect God and give him honour! Now it is time for him to judge people. He made the sky and the earth and the sea. He also made the springs of water. So worship him!’
korean_text: 그가 큰 음성으로 이르되 하나님을 두려워하며 그에게 영광을 돌리라 이는 그의 심판의 시간이 이르렀음이니 하늘과 땅과 바다와 물들의 근원을 만드신 이를 경배하라 하더라

sentences.original_text: He said in a loud voice
' Respect God and give him honour!'
Now it is time for him to judge people
He made the sky and the earth and the sea
He also made the springs of water
